subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The backup catcher Shawn Riggans had three hits and two runs batted in, and the Tampa Bay Rays regained first place in the American League East with a 4-3 win against the host Pittsburgh Pirates.
snippet: The backup catcher Shawn Riggans had three hits and two runs batted in, and the Tampa Bay Rays regained first place in the American League East with a 4-3 win against the host Pittsburgh Pirates.
